channel.title: Need help with Equiment Stats!
channel.description:
Hey guys! I have a question about my equipment stats. Here is my problem
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1zmcl7r.png[/img]
I need the Armor to show up on my character!
I know i have my client working because i have tested on other sources. Just need my source one to work! So can someone please help me and tell me some codes or something to help me!
Would really appreciate Thanks
